summary: Easy way to create a random character and re-roll stats if you wish.
descriptionHtml:
So this little program allows you to easily create a random character for roleplay including randomly generated race, skills, profession and traits. You can easily re-roll if you don't like anything you are given and you may save your characters stats to a .txt file if you wish to have a list of different builds you like. This way you can keep a record just in case!Â 

I have plans of adding in allegiances, descriptions for the traits and professions as well as a list of mods that would suit the different professions for improved roleplay and general gameplay.

If you encounter any bugs or would like me to add something please let me know.
author: Rory Lucey
